channel.title: I'm Starting My Own Shop, Tons Of Stuff To Come
channel.description:
Hey,
I've noticed that I'm really good when it comes to things like clothing saying ideas, or things like that. I write books in my spare time, or when bored, and I've had more than one person tell me that I should think about opening a custom clothing shop when I get some cash. Well, some friends have convinced me to check out Cafepress.com, and I think it's a great idea. The idea of it, is to make your own clothes, and then sell them to people, with no cost to you. Amazing right? I would really like to shake the guys million dollar hand who thought of this, it's genius.
Well, now I've started my own. It's got nothing yet, but I'm brainstorming some ideas, and making other things in photoshop right this second. I know that people have done this before, but this to me is different. I not only want to make my own things, but I want other people to join me. If you can come up with some ideas, not only will I give complete credit, but give all profits to you if sold.
I know that this offer isn't very intriguing since no one even knows my shop name, but if I were to get big, anyone that stuck with me would get benefited a lot more than people that showed up before I got big.
I know this sounds like a pipe dream, but I'm really into this, so please think about it. I'm really into this.
Thanks for reading,
Buzzy
